field_recall_reason_description: All products have been marketed without FDA approval and were manufactured outside of the controls required by current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP)
title: Herbal Doctor Remedies Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall of All Drug Products Due to Marketing Without FDA Approval and Concerns with Manufacturing Practices
description: Herbal Doctor Remedies is voluntarily recalling all drug products (see table below) within expiry to the consumer level.
